title.narrative: More commitment on women, peace and security are implemented and more gender equality advocates influence peace and security processes

description.narrative: The practical actions of UN Women will result in advocacy, awareness-raising, training and increased information on key players in the cause of women. It will also involve relying on all the allies of the gender to promote women's participation in peace and security processes.
